summary: Resemble To Dragon Age Origins-Grey Wardens Armor
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Grey Warden Armor

=========================================================

since there is no Skyrim dragon age Resemble mods here yet, i decided to share something special, yeah Dragon Age 2 Grey Warden Armor (my Favorite).

i did rigg every single piece in that armor manually  , so i hope u guys like it.

the armor now is near to be perfect, support Male and Female.

 And This mod will replace Dvemer\'s armor. also this mod have change texture of grey warden armor so it you want original of grey wardens look download it from optional and replace it.

=========================================================

Installation:

extract the files into your game directory.

Note : this armor replaces with Dwarven armor set ( i hate the look of that armor) so if you want to replace it with another or make an esp feel free to do it (tessnip - skyrim edit)

==========================================================

uninstall:

just delete dwarven folders 

==========================================================

bugs :

* the armor doesn\'t scale with your body (heavy,light) same scale.

that\'s it until we got Blender nif script.

==========================================================

Coming soon :

*World model.

*More DA2 Models.

it may took me some time to work on those things so be patient guys and enjoy 

===========================================================

Credit:

Bioware : Dragon age 2 Grey Warden Model
hehehe : Original Blue texture 
Breger : Texture  http://www.dragonage...le.php?id=2802#

Note: u can use any DA2 Texture just extract erf files.

What\'s New in Version 0.3 
*heavy body\'s neck clipping--->Fixed.
*armor goes dark in outside areas (when not near to light)------->Fixed.
*added no shiny effect.
*Fixed the eye inside the helmet.
*Female Version.
*some minor rigg modifications.
*Original Blue Texture.
